sentences.en: ...problems caused by the influx of refugees.
sentences.cn: …难民大量涌入所造成的问题。

sentences.en: A Risk - Assessment Model of Mine Water influx Based on Theory of Quantification.
sentences.cn: 用数量化理论建立矿井涌水危险性评价模型.

sentences.en: An influx of well - heeled free - spending mainland tourists therefore seems just the ticket.
sentences.cn: 因此,衣着光鲜、挥金如土的大陆游客的流入,就像天赐尤物.

sentences.en: And with an influx of information an influx of confusion.
sentences.cn: 并且随着大量信息的涌入,求职者也非常混乱.

sentences.en: And with an influxof information comes an influx of confusion.
sentences.cn: 而且跟着年夜量信息的涌入,求职者也很是杂乱.

sentences.en: Enforcement action was stepped up and the influx subsided in May 1997.
sentences.cn: 当局于是加强执法行动,而大批儿童涌入本港的情况也于一九九七年五月得以遏止.

sentences.en: More fundamentally, what exactly had triggered the calcium influx?
sentences.cn: 更重要的, 究竟是什麽东西引发钙离子的流入?

sentences.en: Textile workers favoured protection because they feared an influx of cheap cloth.
sentences.cn: 纺织工人拥护贸易保护措施,因为他们担心涌入廉价纺织品.

sentences.en: The hydrodynamic head is provided by influx of fresh water from the interior of tropical Jamaica.
sentences.cn: 水压头是由处于热带的牙买加内地流入的淡水提供的.

sentences.en: The recent mail influx had depressed him.
sentences.cn: 最近的大量邮件使他情绪低沉.

sentences.en: Their influx also makes life much tougher for the generations above them.
sentences.cn: 他们的加入也使上几代人的日子更不好过.

sentences.en: There is a large influx of Latin and Greek borrowings and neologisms.
sentences.cn: 还有大量涌入的拉美和希腊的借款和新词.

sentences.en: There was a sudden influx of goods onto the market.
sentences.cn: 大批商品一下子涌入市场.

sentences.en: There was a sudden influx of household electric products onto the market.
sentences.cn: 大批家用电气产品突然涌进市场.

sentences.en: This in turn has attracted a huge influx of people.
sentences.cn: 这进而吸引了大量人群涌入.

sentences.en: This steady influx counterbalanced by any comparable outgo.
sentences.cn: 流入不绝如缕,却少了相应的流出.

trans.tran_cn: 流入，注入，汇集〔指人或物〕，充斥，注入口，河口
trans.tran_en: the arrival of large numbers of people or large amounts of money, goods etc, especially suddenly
